""""Try something different."""" I have suggested many, MANY times that we create a sustainable and more just society by sharing natural wealth equally. Who will say why we shouldn't? Charge substantial fees to industries that take resources or put pollution. (It becomes profitable for industries to try to *reduce* impacts on the environment. This means better prospects for the future. More hope for the future.) Give fee proceeds to all people. (This would end poverty and give a substantive reason for every person to want to strive to improve the workings of the system, rather than tear it down.) More security for the least secure means more security for all: Cure for what ails the planet:

This wouldn't be so bad but I have been home for 16 straight days now. First my toddler was sick with a stomach bug, then my 6 yr old got the bug, then they both got strep! Single parents struggles. But, I don't want them on a school bus in this so I will have to figure it out! Safe babies!!
